prompts: Create a colorful insect Pokémon that uses sound to battle enemies.
Imagine a Pokémon with a musical theme, featuring vibrant colors and unique instruments.
Design a Pokémon that resembles a cricket, with large wings and a bold personality.
Generate an image of a bug-type Pokémon that has striking red and black colors.
Show me an evolution of a small creature that transforms into a powerful music warrior.
Make a Pokémon with a playful demeanor, known for its ability to create sound waves.
Give me a detailed description of a Pokémon that thrives in grassy environments.
